p: The study makes use of a cellular automata model ( CAb: Cellular Automata biological model) covering biological growth and spatial and temporal distribution of the cod stock. This model is run together with an agent-based model ( ABe: Agent-Based economic model) defined within the same lattice, covering the economic exploitation of the stock. The flow chart of the combined CAb- ABe-model and the connected SinMod model is shown in Fig. 1. While the SinMod model (Slagstad et al. 2015) is a 3D model with a temporal resolution of 6 h (or less), the CAb module is a 2D spatial model with time unit 1 month.
